text: Mario Abramovich (31 October 1926 – 1 December 2014) was an Argentine violinist and composer of Jewish descent. He was a member of the group Sexteto Mayor since its founding in 1973, until his death in 2014. He was known for performing in the Argentine album Bête Noire. Abramovich died in Buenos Aires, Argentina, aged 88. ==Other websites== *"Celos". Contiene un solo de violin de Mario Abramovich. *Historias de oro.
